resources.string: Location based photos! Urban explorers are now Flickr explorers!
:( Shame on you crashing my phone! Here is what happened, make sure it never happens again.
We need your help! Drop us a line with feedback or if you are a developer you can eagle eye our code. Lets make explorers out of everyone: flickr\@novoda.com
If you are a developer you can visit the code here:
Display in a nice frame or across your whole dashboard.
Framed image by Michael Zimmel\n(zimmel on Flickr)

Downloading photos uses bandwidth! \nSome phone packages allow more internet downloads than others. Wifi is not counted in your monthly limit so be sure to explore through web access points when you get the opportunity.
